name: Momo Horror Clicker
description:
Momo Horror Clicker - it's scary funny horror game about momo.
Momo Horror Clicker is challenge for you!
Click on scary horror momo for more power! Do horror momo strong and ubiquitous. Momo send horror messege for people.

Gameplay:
• The level affects the number of feather that are dropped from MoMo per click.
• The cost of the next level is written under the button.
• When you click, can trigger crit. Momo screams out loud and 1 extra feather falls off her
